name: Hopeless (chreeshendolo, Geoff Blair, Bekkett)
description:
Hopeless is a fast paced action game focused on making the right decision for your current situation.

The core mechanic is something we call an Action Tree.

The branches of the tree all have their individual cooldowns, signified by a dark overlay which recesses over time, indicating the branch is no longer on cooldown.

Controls:

- Click and hold down left mouse button to spawn the action tree at that location

- Drag to an action to choose it from the tree

- Drag back to the center to select that action

- Release the left mouse button to execute the action in the depicted direction

- Right mouse button cancels the tree at any time
